Module JBubbleBobble2
Package BubbleBobble.designPattern

Interface HeroActionStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
InvincibleHeroAction, NormalHeroAction
public interface HeroActionStrategy
Strategy interface for defining different actions a hero can perform. Implementations of this interface define specific behaviors for the hero's actions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    move(Hero hero, String direction)
    Defines how the hero moves based on the given direction.
    void
    shootBubble(Hero hero)
    Defines how the hero shoots a bubble.
    void
    shootFireBubble(Hero hero, int type)
    Defines how the hero shoots a fire bubble.

  • Method Details

    • move

      void move(Hero hero, String direction)
      Defines how the hero moves based on the given direction. This method should be implemented with specific movement behavior.
      Parameters:
      hero - The hero that will perform the movement.
      direction - The direction in which the hero should move (e.g., "Left", "Right", "Up").

    • shootBubble

      void shootBubble(Hero hero)
      Defines how the hero shoots a bubble. This method should be implemented with specific bubble-shooting behavior.
      Parameters:
      hero - The hero that will shoot the bubble.

    • shootFireBubble

      void shootFireBubble(Hero hero, int type)
      Defines how the hero shoots a fire bubble. This method should be implemented with specific fire bubble behavior.
      Parameters:
      hero - The hero that will shoot the fire bubble.
      type - The type of fire bubble to be shot (e.g., different kinds of fireballs).
